title: First Time Tahm Supports be Like

replies.body: Best drawing skills if these are yours.
Yes, it's mine, and yes, it's clear how incredible my artistic talent is by the fact that I drew Tahm as a blob with stubs for legs.

Better than me, way better than me.
You could make a pretty good comic series out of this.

There's something to be said for being able to put the blobs in the right spots and with the right proportions to achieve a particular aesthetic sense.  So good job.  You made this minimalist style work really well.
Wow, that was really well put. Thanks!
If you wanted, this could become a meme.
Honestly that would be amazing.

Can I steal your blob for my disqus icon? (Please)

I'm typically some kind of smiley face, but this one makes my heart tingle.
Of course, man. Go forth and tingle the hearts of all who read your Disqus comments.
Isn't that what he is?

> [{quoted}](name=A Latte Trouble,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=X6yq2YwL,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-01-11T09:24:31.094+0000)
>
> Yes, it's mine, and yes, it's clear how incredible my artistic talent is by the fact that I drew Tahm as a blob with stubs for legs.

You don't need to have them be pristine, they just need to show enough emotion. Which these do. Very well. Enjoy the upvotes, they're deserved :)

I couldn't draw a stick figure to save my life... Put that into perspective now. XD

Oh yeah its great and well made! {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
He's just missing the catfish mustache thing. But it's still dope.
The Riot Art Team Job Offer will role in any second now..... aannnyyy second now...

Mine was more along the lines of:

{{champion:22}} TAHM I'M AT 30 HEALTH AND THEY'RE BOTH AFTER ME, SAVE ME!

{{champion:223}} But then how will I do the damage?

(Proceeds attempting a 2v1 while shouting "UNKENCH THIS BENCH!")

For me it's more often the exact opposite.

{{champion:223}} ASHE! You're at 30 health! Run to me so I can save you!

{{champion:22}} No way! One more auto and they'll be at half health. 

(Proceeds to run away from me and die, followed by me because I was dumb enough to try to save them)

For me it's way different 

{{champion:22}} Tahm, Save ME PLOOOX
{{champion:223}} OK I'm going bb -misses ashe and eats a close minion-
{{champion:22}} F*#@$%...sigh

and lotts of times

{{champion:223}} ults to safe place and waits for ashe to get in
{{champion:22}} keeps on moving without realizing tahm ulted

riot could make a QOL buff to improve tahm's ult visually

or when I finally get 3 stacks up in the middle of a team fight so I can W to take someone out and remove their damage but an ally walks in front. {{item:3070}} 
Then I start spamming W again: GET OUT

lol it happened to me once, adc almost dying and i have an enemy my belly

i'm like http://static5.gamespot.com/uploads/square_avatar/1551/15516851/2941753-lfs3.png
and my adc http://static3.gamespot.com/uploads/square_avatar/1551/15516851/2941751-lfs1.png
{{champion:223}} shouts: GET IN!
More please!! You could easily make a great series with these kinds of drawings and funny comics. 10/10, need more.

Hmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmm

http://media.lolusercontent.com/api/embedly/1/image/resize?url=http%3A%2F%2Fi68.tinypic.com%2F10e53xl.jpg&key=a45e967db0914c7fb472fd4381e6c85b&width=425

Hmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmm

http://img.pokemondb.net/artwork/quagsire.jpg

http://cdn.pokestache.com/2013/5/18/c8e78529de9297989725068f135c950b.gif
Quagsire and Tahm Kench are distant relatives. It's canon, I swear.
Pokemon + LoL crossover confirmed.
more like quagsire x tahm

You should make more of these.

Pls.
Glad to hear you liked it! Creating more league strips and possibly turning this into a series is definitely something I'm considering.

> [{quoted}](name=A Latte Trouble,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=X6yq2YwL,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-01-11T19:04:19.069+0000)
>
> Glad to hear you liked it! Creating more league strips and possibly turning this into a series is definitely something I'm considering.

I want to see what all LOL champions look like with your artistic design.
Awww! I love happy blob Tahm. I aspire to make that exact face at all times while playing my signature "No Worries Tahm Kench".  :)

Minimalist art style OP.

Please make more or I will die.

Wow Latte sisT smh I can'T believe yew have time tew make silly litTle comics buT noT enough time for Sriracha dittos yew lil heaux. 

Keep up the good work Latte, next you should make a strip on our Runaan's Orianna games. :secretkpop:
Runaan's Orianna is kind of op. I don't want the secret to winning every League game falling into the wrong hands

> [{quoted}](name=A Latte Trouble,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=X6yq2YwL,comment-id=000c0000,timestamp=2016-01-11T20:58:37.507+0000)
>
> Runaan's Orianna is kind of op. I don't want the secret to winning every League game falling into the wrong hands

Not as broken as Jungle Ori though, amirite?
Before the sated nerfs i playrd the shit outta jg ori with sated
irl do ap yi tho "trust me"
It was his first tahm supporting
Oh my god why
Looks like Paint Tool Sai. Am I correct?
Yes, I used SAI to draw this! Trying to figure out how you knew that, tbh
This is 100% why I'm always afraid of first time Kench players. You can see them running toward you with that look, they must save you even if it isn't needed.
Dont let your artistic talent consume you, Latte. ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
This happened so much in ofa because we would all try to eat the first person to get 3 stacks, one would succeed the rest would eat each other and get confused

I've never played Tahm (because I don't like how mean and evil he looks), but this was super hilarious! I'm honestly considering playing him now. Please do more <3 maybe you could do a tumblr blog or something? I know I'd definitely follow your comics like crazy if you did more! As some people said above, this is perfectly minimal. I really enjoy this type of art! You've got a fan now, haha :D

Thanks!

You should definitely try him out. I played him during the week that he was free and I had a lot of fun. Maybe I just have a weird definition of cute, but even though he does look mean and evil, seeing him waddle around the rift is cute (spamming his laugh animation is kind of adorable too).
The art style was perfect for the joke, it made me laugh really hard
g-guys are you serious... Its literally a blob with legs.. My 4 year old cousin can do this. I guess she deserves to be hired at riot as well.
As much as I want to completely disagree with you, the boards _are_ a bit too kind. That said, I really appreciate the confidence and motivation boost they give me.

> [{quoted}](name=A Latte Trouble,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=X6yq2YwL,comment-id=00210000,timestamp=2016-01-12T18:16:09.308+0000)
>
> As much as I want to completely disagree with you, the boards _are_ a bit too kind. That said, I really appreciate the confidence and motivation boost they give me.

I'm not trying to be that guy. But i mean come on. Its a cute drawing and comic it really is, I just don't like when people circle jerk and don't give any criticism. Its how artists get better.

Tahm, yes.
http://media.lolusercontent.com/api/embedly/1/image/resize?url=http%3A%2F%2Fi68.tinypic.com%2F10e53xl.jpg&key=a45e967db0914c7fb472fd4381e6c85b&width=425
Can you draw every champ with that face pls?
